content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 17}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 37, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 24, "index": 38}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 24, "index": 40}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 53, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a stone_axe, I need to place 2 cobblestones and a stick in the crafting grid. The first cobblestone should go into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_axe
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 17}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 37, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 24, "index": 38}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 24, "index": 40}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 53, "index": 45}]
thought: The second cobblestone should go into slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1
